# Luftborn Task 🎉 | [Live](https://luftborn-task-osamaasayed.vercel.app/)

#### A repo for Luftborn task built using React, Typescript & Sass

#### ✅ Fully Responsive For All Screens

## 📁Project Structure

```
📦src
 ┣ 📂assets
 ┃ ┗ 📜react.svg
 ┣ 📂components
 ┃ ┣ 📂home
 ┃ ┃ ┗ 📜ProductList.tsx
 ┃ ┣ 📂layout
 ┃ ┃ ┗ 📜Aside.tsx
 ┃ ┗ 📂shared
 ┃ ┃ ┣ 📜ProductCard.tsx
 ┃ ┃ ┗ 📜ProductCardSkeleton.tsx
 ┣ 📂constants
 ┃ ┗ 📜index.ts
 ┣ 📂pages
 ┃ ┗ 📜Home.tsx
 ┣ 📂styles
 ┃ ┗ 📂sass
 ┃ ┃ ┣ 📂abstracts
 ┃ ┃ ┃ ┣ 📜_functions.scss
 ┃ ┃ ┃ ┣ 📜_index.scss
 ┃ ┃ ┃ ┣ 📜_mixins.scss
 ┃ ┃ ┃ ┗ 📜_variables.scss
 ┃ ┃ ┣ 📂base
 ┃ ┃ ┃ ┣ 📜_animations.scss
 ┃ ┃ ┃ ┣ 📜_base.scss
 ┃ ┃ ┃ ┣ 📜_index.scss
 ┃ ┃ ┃ ┣ 📜_typography.scss
 ┃ ┃ ┃ ┗ 📜_utilities.scss

 ┃ ┃ ┃ ┣ 📜_aside-card.scss
 ┃ ┃ ┃ ┣ 📜_card.scss
 ┃ ┃ ┃ ┗ 📜_index.scss
 ┃ ┃ ┣ 📂layout
 ┃ ┃ ┃ ┣ 📜_grid.scss
 ┃ ┃ ┃ ┗ 📜_index.scss
 ┃ ┃ ┣ 📂pages
 ┃ ┃ ┃ ┣ 📜_home.scss
 ┃ ┃ ┃ ┗ 📜_index.scss
 ┃ ┃ ┗ 📜style.scss
 ┣ 📂types
 ┃ ┗ 📜index.ts
 ┣ 📜App.tsx
 ┣ 📜index.css
 ┣ 📜main.tsx
 ┗ 📜vite-env.d.ts
```
